title: Message from MysteryStranger
content: You have no idea how much your presence means to someone.

title: Message from ShadowSeeker
content: Not all heroes wear capes... some just stay anonymous.

title: Message from SecretWatcher
content: You're stronger than you think, keep your head up!

title: Message from SilentAdmirer
content: You bring light into the lives of others without even trying.

title: Message from HiddenGuardian
content: The best things come when you least expect them.
